description:
Immunohistochemistry using paraffin sections.

There are several options for some steps and all the options are listed on Steps section.

The suitable options for each antibody is noted on Guidelines&warnings section.
manuscript_citation: Fujisawa M, Moh-Moh-Aung A, Zeng Z, Yoshimura T, Wani Y, Matsukawa A (2018) Ovarian stromal cells as a source of cancer-associated fibroblasts in human epithelial ovarian cancer: A histopathological study. PLoS ONE 13(10): e0205494. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0205494
guidelines:
Individual procedure for each antibody:

 

FOXL2

1 > 2 > 3.1 > 4 > 5.1 > 6.1 > 7 > 8.1


ASMA/FOXL2 double staining

1 > 2 > 4(ASMA) > 5.3 > 6.2 > 3.1 > 4(FOXL2) > 5.1 > 6.1 > 7 > 8.2

 

FAP/FOXL2 double staining

   1 > 2 > 3.1 > 4(FOXL2) > 5.1 > 6.1 > 3.1 > 4(FAP) > 5.3 > 6.2 > 7 > 8.2

 

CD163

   1 > 2 > 3.2 > 4 > 5.2 > 6.1 > 7 > 8.1

 

CD138

   1 > 2 > 3.2 > 4 > 5.2 > 6.1 > 7 > 8.1

 

CD31/FOXL2 double staining

   1 > 2 > 3.1 > 4(FOXL2) > 5.1 > 6.1 > 3.2 > 4(CD31) > 5.3 > 6.2 > 7 > 8.2

 

Type4 Collagen/FOXL2 double staining

   1 > 2 > 3.1 > 4(FOXL2) > 5.1 > 6.1

   >3.1 > 3.3 > 4(Type4 collagen) > 5.3 > 6.2 > 7 > 8.2

 

CD45/FOXL2 double staining

   1 > 2 > 3.1 > 4(FOXL2) > 5.1 > 6.1 > 3.1 > 4(CD45) > 5.3 > 6.2 > 7 > 8.2

 

CD163/FOXL2 double staining

   1 > 2 > 3.1 > 4(FOXL2) > 5.1 > 6.1 > 3.2 > 4(CD163) > 5.3 > 6.2 > 7 > 8.2

 

 

Antibody Species Clone or Code No. Manufacturer Dilution Antigen Retrieval Detection System Chromogen (color)
FOXL2 goat, polyclonal NB100-1277 Novus Biologicals, Littlecon, CO 1:400 Citrate pH6 Polink-2 Plus HRPa DAB(brown)
ASMA mouse, monoclonal 1A4 Dako, Carpinteria, CA 1:100 None ImmPRESS-APb Vector Red (red)b
FAP rabbit, polyclonal NB100-58755 Novus Biologicals, Littlecon, CO 1:100 Citrate pH6 ImmPRESS-APb Vector Red (red)b
CD138 mouse, monoclonal B-A38 Cell Marque, Rocklin, CA 1:100 EDTA pH8 Simple Stain MAX POc DAB(brown)
CD163 mouse, monoclonal 10D6 Novocastla, Newcastle, UK 1:200 EDTA pH8 Simple Stain MAX POcd DAB(brown)d
CD45 mouse, monoclonal 2B11+PD7/26 Dako, Carpinteria, CA 1:100 Citrate pH6 ImmPRESS-APb Vector Red (red)b
CD31 mouse, monoclonal JC70A Dako, Carpinteria, CA 1:40 EDTA pH8 ImmPRESS-APb Vector Red (red)b
Collagen Type4 mouse, monoclonal CIV22 Cell Marque, Rocklin, CA 1:500 Citrate pH6e ImmPRESS-APb Vector Red (red)b

 

aGBI labs, Bothell, WA.

bVector laboratories, Burlingame, CA.

cNichirei Biosciences, Tokyo, Japan.

dFor the double staining with FOXL2, CD163 was visualized with ImmPRESS-AP and Vector Red (red).

eThis microwave treatment was followed by Proteinase K treatment (0.002% Proteinase K, 3minutes, in room temperature).

Citrate buffer stock solution (x10):

Citric acid monohydrate 0.9556g

Trisodium citrate dihydrate 13.23g

Dissolve in DW

Final volume 500ml

Dilute this ten times before use

"},{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":"

EDTA stock solution (0.5M):

EDTA 2Na 186.12g

dissolve in DW and adjust pH with 1M NaOH

Final volume and pH 1000ml pH8.0

Dilute this 500 times before use

"},{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":"

Proteinase K: 20mg/ml (Roche, Cat No. 03 115 887 001)

Proteinase K dilution buffer:

TrisHCl 1M pH7.6 2ml

DW 98ml

CaCl2 0.294g

Dilute Proteinase K 1000 times with dilution buffer just before use

"}]}
